Efeso Collins: Green MP’s maiden speech dream to inspire misfits, unloved and the invisible https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/efeso-collins-green-mps-maiden-speech-dream-to-inspire-misfits-unloved-and-the-invisible/VAEBXJQ6SREOXKUGWJRDQDPGFY/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/efeso-collins-green-mps-maiden-speech-dream-to-inspire-misfits-unloved-and-the-invisible/VAEBXJQ6SREOXKUGWJRDQDPGFY/ Collins, 49, died at ChildFund Water Run near Britomart train station in Auckland today.
